markdownRemark.html:
The Tea Party is probably the loudest and most dangerous fringe in U.S. politics today (and that’s saying a lot — both sides have some really whacked-out fringes). But this just shows that the real power in the Republican party is, was, and always be big money. And big money won’t let a debt default happen, because it could be veryexpensive for them.

Tomado de un comentario de Marco Arment sobre los eventos recientes de la política gringa.
